description: This file defines the NoteRepository class responsible for saving and loading notes using Android's SharedPreferences, with JSON serialization via Gson.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository class for managing notes storage and retrieval using SharedPreferences and Gson.

methods.name: NoteRepository
methods.description: Constructor that initializes SharedPreferences and Gson instances.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Retrieves the list of notes, deserializing JSON stored in SharedPreferences, and sorts them by timestamp in descending order.

methods.name: saveNotes
methods.description: Serializes the list of notes into JSON and saves it into SharedPreferences.
